import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Contact.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faUser, faEnvelope, faMessage, faPhone, faLocationDot, faClock, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { useAsyncError } from "react-router-dom"; function Contact() { const [showSuccess, setShowSuccess] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setShowSuccess(true); }; return (

Contact Us

Address

Lokomotive 16, 71000 Sarajevo

Phone

+387 63 221 804

Working Hours

Mon - Fri: 9:00 - 17:00

{showSuccess ? (
We received your message. We will reply to your email address.
) : (
)}
); } export default Contact;
